resources.string: Imagine a Word or a Name. Suppose it can be the Name of your first crush and Note the total letter of that word.
Now follow me. Hope you will enjoy
Enter the total letter of that name :
Tap on lines from below for every letter one by one. Consider space in your name as hyphen \'-\'
Suppose, I am assuming a word \"Android\". Now the length of that word is the total letter, which is 7.

The word \'Android\' has \'A\' as first letter. so, you should tap on first line for \'A\' and then the second letter \'n\' is in line 3 so you should tap on line 3 and So on...\nLength of your word was:
